reviewText: wonderful tips for children to use if abducted. Best I've seen

Great video!! As a single dad of two boys, I wanted to provide prepare my kids with some simple skills to help prevent an abduction. We had a blast learning the skills.
I would recommend this video to anyone!!
John Snider
A wonderful video!! I have two daughters, ages 5 & 8, who found the Kid Escape skills easy and fun to learn.

I thought the Kid Escape from Child Abductors video was superb! I have three girls (ages 7, 10 & 12) and they all three learned a great deal. As a teacher, I plan on showing this video to my 3rd graders.
This video gave me, as a parent, a real peace of mind that my kids are prepared - just in case!!

Kid Escape is a wonderful video for kids & parents. My two sons (ages 5 & 7) learned a great deal from this video. We practice the Kid Escape skills at least once a month.
A very worthwhile investment!
